## Feature Description
A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like.

## Use Case
Describe the problem this feature would solve or the workflow it would improve.

**Example:**
"As a developer, I want to [do something] so that I can [achieve goal]."

## Proposed Solution
How do you envision this feature working?

```bash
# Example command
gplay new-command --flag value
```

## Alternatives Considered
Have you considered any alternative solutions or workarounds?

## Additional Context
- Does this relate to a Google Play Console feature?
- Link to Google Play API documentation (if applicable)
